content.detailedDescription:
The sun was about to go down,i was was sitting in my back yard going on
my second beer, the it was an almost clear afternoon, there were only
transparent clouds in the sky,know this because i have a habit of looking at the sky when ever i'm out side.

on that afternoon four boomerang like shapes suddenly began coming out of 
a cloud that was just above my house, they seem to be flowing in formation
three in front and one in the back of them, i say that they seem to be flowing because i couldn't hear an engine of any kind.

they were they size of a 747 and seem to be flying about some 15,000 feet
or lower, because i felt that i could almost touch them.There were no lights there color was gray.

i believed that a time dimension window open,which allow me to see them 
as they pass by,i believed that they were actual in another time dimension,that's why there was no noise, and that's why nobody else saw then, i say this because you couldn't miss something that big,also for
some unknown reason this area seems to be point x for ufo activity.

i ran to call my wife,but she took too long to respond and by the time i finally got her to come out side, the show was over.

after witnessing something like that i began question myself wondering if
i had actual witness such an event,and if i hadn't, what cause my mind to project such a so real event?

that's all i have to say,
thank you for your time.
content.summary: They came out of a transparent cloud ,

content.detailedDescription:
i just now discovered this "agency" (mufon) where i can report this. that is why it was so long ago. the date and time i've given are estimations. the date is within a week (give or take a few days) of this occurance. the time, is relatively close because this happened near dusk. it was still light outside, but just beginning to get dark.
 i was driving down st. rt. 603 south between plymouth, oh 44865 and shiloh, oh 44878. there is a large "s" curve in the road about 1.5 miles outside shiloh. when i saw this "object/light" in the sky i was about .5 miles before that curve. while i was driving, i looked up and saw this amazingly bright green light just hovering in the sky. it seemed to be a mile or so away from me, given it was in the sky; but i really don't know how far away it was. this was not something normal to be seen around here. it was not a plane or balloon, or anything like that. it was the brightest neon green i've ever seen in my life. it was shaped like the planet saturn. round for the most part, but a lot wider in the middle like the rings on saturn. as i was driving i slowed down (but didn't stop) to see this "object". it was there in the sky for about 20 seconds, and then vanished. but it was just hovering there, not moving at all. then like that it was gone. 
 it kind of startled me to see this, because i'd never seen anything like it before. it gave me the chills, and i thought of the possibility of a ufo. i continued driving to shiloh. ( i was headed to a friends house at the time) when i got there i told my friend what i had seen in the sky. when i was telling him about it i was excited, but also nervous. it was just one of the weirdest things that i'd ever seen. i hope to see something like this again someday.
content.summary: Bright green object hovering in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I went onto my balcony for a smoke and not 10 seconds later, i look towards the woods behind our parking lot, and there was a very large "y" shaped object. it seemed to be glowing in a yellow, almost orange color. at first i thought it was a helicopter until it actually crossed over the tree line and there was no sound and i realized it was silent. i was frozen in shock as it seemed to drift in a semi circle around the field the pick up speed and head across the interstate toward the cornfields. when it was out of sight i ran to get my phone to call my brother who was staying on the other side of town and told him to look north in the sky. it was gone. the object was the size of three suvs strung together and made no noise but i felt like it knew i was watching. i've never been more terrified in my life.
content.summary: A "y" shaped object seemed to float rapidly over the tree line and towards the farmland.

content.detailedDescription: I wad watching television when my brother (an outside smoker) ran in and beckoned me to run outside and look at the night sky. i saw an orb or a white starlike object floating extremely silently over our house about 3 or 4 hundred feet. just above another plane that past just  under it. we yelled and whistled at it to get it's attention hen about 10 seconds later it burned out in 4 seconds. no faa lights were seen. plus as a plane approaches its headlights are bright and visible then as it passes it dissipates. not so with this ufo. it was bright in all directions. chrystal clear night and i know aircraft like the back of my hand. it was way to close not to hear or see any structure or faa lights operating. this was an advanced craft of some kind! incredible! my first real sighting!
content.summary: A craft about as bright a jupiter silently hovered 300 feet across the sky over our house and then after yelling at it, it burned out. no

content.detailedDescription: i was in about the 5th grade. i lived in a home near cullaby lake in warrenton or. i woke in the middle of the night and was face up in my bed and could not move. the room was filled with a grey/blue light and i saw the heads of 2 short figures raised up next to my bed. they had skinny necks and dark oval eyes and triangle shaped heads. i was very frightened and tried to move. my torso was immobile. but i could move my left arm so i tried to bang against my bedroom wall to wake my mother down the hall. she  didnt hear me. thats all i remember. the next night the same thing happened but i was able to get my left arm free and punched one of the figures in the face. what also was strange was that i didnt remember these events right away. one morning i woke up and remembered these events had happened a week or so before. i morning i remembered i found i had a sore spot on the back left of my skull. the area was now a dent. i still have it to this day. and was tender to the touch almost like a soft spot for the next 8 years or so. years later i was on a date next to cullaby lake and my now wife and i witnessed a strange light going back and forth  behing the mountains across from carnahan county park which is about 2 blocks from the house that i had this encounter in. i dont remember the color of the light. maybe blue.
content.summary: In my room
Big skary went make loud

content.detailedDescription: I just walk out on porch look up and there it was glowing red an orange .It was just siting there .And it just disapeared.Did not take off just disapeared.It was the size of a foot ball field.No body belives me but i saw it.I have not seen eny thing like it before i wish are gov would tell the truth about things like this .I thought it was a secert air plane or somthing .But have never seen eny thing like it.I would like to no if eny body seen a triange shape like this or have pitchures.
content.summary: Triangle shape red orange glow

content.detailedDescription: While out smoking, i noticed what i thought to be a satellite orbiting near the big dipper in the sky. while watching it, it turned sharply and moved 90 degrees from it's original trajectory smoothly in the sky as it had before. i know for a fact that no satellite turns, as it has no jets and is suspended in orbit. i am more than 5000 ft above sea level and see the stars clearly. i noticed it because it was the only thing moving in the sky. i lost sight of the object when it disappeared from view behind the mountain horizon, but it was thousands [or more] miles away.
content.summary: Turning satellite near orion

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside letting my dog do his business, when i noticed what looked like a small aircraft flying in a westerly direction. i then noticed another small craft approaching in a easterly direction, another in northeaserly direction and another from the south. at firt i concluded that perhaps they were all aircraft headed toward different destinations, but it wouldn't seem likely or make since that they would all end up in the same approximate area at the same time, but they did. i then noticed a couple of minutes later, a large bright globular glowing craft heading in a easterly direction. i stood there for a minute and then became concerned.

 as the large circular craft  came closer in my direction, i began to shine a flashlight that i was carring with me in it's direction. it then traveled about 500 hundred feet or more and then turned it's lights completely off. i'm not sure but i don't think that aircrafts do that. i then began  to scan the skies for the globular object but could no longer see it, but the other crafts were still in the area.  they however all went in different directions after the globular craft could no longer be seen. i hate to admit it but it frightened me so that i then went into my home and called local authorities.
 
 the police dept dispatcher stated that they did not handle those type of calls, but gave me a number to the f.A.A.  i then called the f.A.A. and the person on the phone stated that they didn't handle these type of calls either, but would refer me to another dept which was located in washington state, so they transfered me to another person who asked me for my name and telephone number. i gave them the information they asked for and then began to give a description of the details of the events that had transpried.
 
after giving them the information they then stated that they would look into it and someone would get back with me  i have been frightened before, but not like this. not to the point where i felt that i had to call the police dept, f.A.A and who ever else to get them involved in this. i'm tired of hearing the word fake. these things are not fake. they are real and if it is their objective to destroy us, they will easily succeed because no one will even believe that they exist. i have submitted several pictures in the past, only to have someone say that they were investigating it. but nothing has come of it. there needs to be a place where people can call, give descriptions and real investigations can be launched. i am not implying that mufon does not do real investigations, i'm just stating that from what i have seen. i can say that it's beginning to get real serious now. and until someone with some real power to do something believes these creatures are real. we may all be powerless to stop what ever objective they have.

 i realize that so far from my experiences they have only invaded our airspace. but i don't know why i believe it, but i for some reason believe that they have been in my home, inserted something into my body while i slept although i have no way to prove this. paranoid perhaps but if you've seen what i seen, maybe you would be too.
content.summary: I large round craft and 5 or 6 crafts in same area

content.detailedDescription: I stepped out side to gaze at the sky. it was around 9:00pm. the sky was clear. i looked up towards the northwest, and seen a white sphere shaped object, moving towards the east. it looked as though it was going to go directly over my head, but than abruptly turned south and disappeared.
content.summary: White sphere shaped object

content.detailedDescription:
Back in 2004 or 2005 my brother and i noticed a strange blue light that gets bigger and brighter after a thunder storm over my barn.

one night the power was out and me and my brother was standing in the kitchen looking out towards the road because we saw this bright blue light that seamed to just get brighter and brighter with no explanation. we thought ok is this a car?  why is this light getting brighter and brighter and bigger?

we opened the door and went outside and before we could make our way to the barn the light just vanished and we had an eery feeling so we went back inside the house.
content.summary: Strange blue light over my barn that seamed to grow in size and get brighter

content.detailedDescription:
Curiously, my report is almost identical to case # 26161 of the 10/27/2010.

just after work today, shortly after 5:30 pm, i observed a very luminous, oval-shaped object moving nw to se (a rough estimate) above and behind a commercial airliner that was on a west to east course. both were observed in clear sky, just to the north of a high layer of cloudiness moving in from the south. at the time of the sighting, the clouds were just obscuring the sun. both the plane and the object were approximately 35 degrees above the western horizon.  when the object's path intersected the airliner's contrail, it appeared to stop.  through 7-power binoculars, the object appeared as a fuzzy compact oval shape that was extremely luminous--much more so than any of the surrounding clouds or the contrail; it appeared as a reflection or light source, but fuzzy--diffuse. it appeared that there might have been several tiny condensations within the fuzzy shape. its size was several (perhaps ten) of the plane's contrail widths in diameter.  while continuing to observing the object over the course of five minutes while driving home, it appeared to grow in size and look like a small cloud.  at this point, i decided to pull over and get a  picture of it.

i thought this worthy of reporting because of the almost identical appearance to case # 26161 of yeaterday, at the same time, in the same direction, angular height, and also because of the apparent close association to a commercial aircraft.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Very luminous oval shape moving above and behind high-altitude commercial jet that turned into a...Cloud?

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in my driveway, which is in a rural area, away from light pollution.  the sky was perfectly clear and  i was looking up at the night sky, towards the big dipper.  i noticed a very bright light, larger than how most planets appear.  it was moving in an arc from west to east in the northern sky.  at first i thought it was a plane but i did not see any flashing lights, only the steady white light.  it seemed to wobble on its path briefly and as it neared the eastern side of my viewing area, another bright light of similar size and intensity approached from the southeast, seemingly on a near-collision course with the first light.  their paths crossed, both lights seemed to stop and the southeastern light turned red and both lights disappeared.  my guess on the amount of time that elapsed was perhaps 20 seconds.  i thought holy mackerel, i might have just seen two ufo's.  it was so moving that i called my boyfriend on my cell phone because i felt i needed to report the sighting to someone.  i then came in the house to  my computer and did a google search to check if anyone else had seen what i had seen.  so here i am, a bit bewildered but also excited to have had the experience.  take good care, all.
content.summary: A bright light approached from the west, passed to the east and appeared to be intersected by another bright light approaching from the south east., the southeast light then appeared red and both disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the backporch, which faces east towards clayton county, when i saw a large bright light behind the far treeline.....It was much farther than the trees, and they have to be a couple miles away...When i first saw it behind the trees i thought it was the moon but it was moving wayyyy too fast for that...It looked to the eye at that distance to be about the size of a quarter moon as it looks to the eye......Huge, brilliant white light, with a darker color light at bottom...It moved in a totally straight level line from north to south at a constant speed..Im not sure if it was shifting colors or strobing, the one on the bottom, that is....It happened so fast.....Because of the size it seemed to move slow, but the time it took to cross all the way out of sight was faster than the planes we see every night move.....It was just huge....I called my friend out to see, and she saw it as it continued to move towards the south until the sight was totally blocked....Unfortunately i am the only one who saw it in the clearing, but she can testify as to the size of it moving beyond the treeline......I lost sight when it went too far south to see the light for the trees blocking the view....
content.summary: Large oval white object came from behind far treeline crossing north to south over western clayton county with flashing light on bottom, far too large to be airplane from that distance

content.detailedDescription: Was outside just walking around when i saw this bright white light going south to north towards abilene texas. i thought it might have been a satellite but it was way to low to be a satellite, theres no way this was a satellite. it just kept going then all of a sudden it dimmed out and was gone, as though it turned its lights off. i hope someone else here saw this. it was quite noticeable up in the sky.
content.summary: Bright light

content.detailedDescription:
Estabamos llendo desde el ca������on del atuel san rafael argentina al dique los reyunos san rafael , como me gusta sacar fotos y queriendo recordar todos los lugares, cuando estabamos pasando el dique galileo vitali baje del auto para sacar un par de fotos , primero saque una al dique a la derecha , despues una un poco a la isquierda para tomar la totalidad y despues para acordarme una al cartel del dique.

la maquina de fotos es una nikon coolpix 5.00mp.La foto es la 0386.

cuando llego a mi casa en lomas al ver foto x foto encuentro esta.
 
viendo ayer 27/10 en history hablaron de ustedes y con ovnis o no se saben
de donde son ?

como esto es algo que me encanta a ustedes les puede servir para ampliar alguna deduccion mas.

me gustaria saber algo mas de esta foto.

desde ya y a la espera de vuestros comentarios los saludo muy atte.

*(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Lo encontre despues , no en ese momento (desgraciadamente)

content.detailedDescription: On 10-28-10 at approximately 1915 three of my friends and i observed a bright white light traveling slowly across the night sky from my driveway. the sky was clear. this object was just so bright and it looked too low in the sky to be a satellite. i have seen many satellites and this just did not behave like one. i live about 2 to 3 miles from the airport. airplanes were clearly visible circling in the sky, and appeared to be much higher than this object. it was very quiet and lasted for approximately 30 seconds to 1 minute. the bright white light then shut off, and then there was a tiny red light, for about 2 seconds and then that shut off. it almost appeared as though this object just vanished. i lost sight of this object because the lights turned off and it was gone.
content.summary: Bright white object traveling across the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I arrived at my house at 4:47pm coming home after work. i parked in my drive way which faces north on the north west side of oklahoma city. my drive way goes up before leveling off, so when i pulled up i noticed a helicopter extremely high in the air. that is what first caught my attention. i parked and got out of my truck and began watching it. i have never seen a helicopter so high in the sky just staying stationary. it was much higher then the normal police, news or traffic helicopter. it appeared to be positioned there for a reason. it looked like a military helicopter by the shape and the dark color. i watched it for about five minutes and it did not budge. then i saw them.........Directly in front of the helicopter a white oval globe or star like object appeared slowly and faded away, then another behind that one as the first one faded out.Almost in a sequence moving forward one after the other appeared and faded out moving away from the helicopter. there was four total. they appeared one at a time never shining at the same moment. the sky was clear blue and  they were bright white like a star. the objects moved west in a line away from the helicopter that remained still facing west. they moved behind some trees and my house where i could know longer see them. that lasted about three minutes. i continued to watch and my girlfriend came out to see what i was looking at. she then made the statment that it was weird to see that helicopter hovering like it was so high up. i told her what i saw and we watched together for about 15 more minutes and the helicopter never left that spot. we went in a i turned on the news to see if there was some breaking news on that side of town that might call for a helicopter to be needed. nothing happened in our area, or at least it wasn't reported.

i regret not getting out my camera, but the objects caught me off guard because i was focussed on the helicopter.It almost seemed like it was ordered to stay stationary and to observe the objects. the whole thing just seems really weird and out of place to me. i did see today that there was another sighting in okc that night.
content.summary: 4 white globe like objects appeared in and vanished in sequence in front of a military helicopter.

content.detailedDescription: While driving my truck west on hwy 6, about ten miles before bremen, i saw a round red flashing object approximately 250 yards out my right window. i thought it was a tractor in a field. then it changed color to green and i thought it was a stop light, but it was in a field. when i came even with it, it changed to a florescent blue and shot straight up in the sky. i've seen these before but never that close. i called my wife and told her to report it right away. just in case. contact me on my cell if you want. the company i drive for is out of butler, indiana, and i am often driving on this road.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: While driving west on hwy 6, saw out right window round red flashing object

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my friend ware driving back from work around 11:20pm on route 270 going towards germantown, went we saw a round, green light, like a fireball falling from the sky,but it appeared to be coming straight down almost like a falling arrow

i thought it was a firework but no, my friend was so surprise of what he saw and he ask me if i saw it and i say yes man you are not crazy i saw it too.

i put a picture of the area of where we saw it, sorry i  did not have to to take a picture of it because it happen to fast for us to react
content.summary: Fireball fall from the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Back in 1976, when i was 10-11 years old, i had two encounters with craft during daylight and at a close proximity to me which has made me a believer in ufo's ever since.  i don't believe that either of these craft could have been anything that we could have "reverse engineered", though i do believe that we do now have some "home grown ufo's" here in the u.S. which would make it hard to discern between "theirs" and "ours".

i have continually "watched the skies" for the past 35 years and have had (to my regret) no other encounters since those two when i was a young boy, but that's all changed in the past week as i have had three separate sightings in less than a week.  

i've read that ufo sightings have had a sharp increase this year. i wasn't going to report the 2nd sighting...Feeling that people would think i was some kind of crackpot who was making it up after just having reported one a few days prior (two in one week).  then, i had the third sighting and decided that i was obligated to report them all--regardless if anyone believes me or not. we're never going to get any kind of disclosure from our government if we don't speak up and tell what we've been seeing!

 i believe we are about to have some type of earth changing "event" which will lead up to "something big" in 2012 in regard to our own evolutionary/spriritual changes as well as a new age of truth (though full disclosure may come in stages) in regard to aliens/ufo's and our "real" history as a species. i think the increase in ufo activity is just the beginning.

here are brief details of the sightings i have had this past week (i won't go into detail about the one's 35 years ago, though they were quite incredible):

1- 10-21/22-10?(can't recall exact day, i reported it that evening on mufon site right after i saw it late in the evening) - extremely bright star like object- silver white light. hovered silently in the sky and quickly dimmed over the last 5 seconds that i saw it. the whole thing only lasted about 15 seconds.

2-10-24-10-late evening (10:30-11:30pm, est). 6-8 bright quickly flashing/stobing red and white lights on bottom of a craft that flew directly over me at an altitude of maybe 1000-2000 feet. no sound. could tell by stobing lights that the craft was either triangular or circular from the way the lights lit up the under side of it. kept it in sight for several minutes as it approached me, flew directly over and past me and then out of sight.

3-10-27-10- 10:25pm (est)- this was the best one of the week!  four extremely bright white lights on the side facing me (i believe the lights went all the way around the circumference)on what i believe was an oval/saucer shaped craft, no more than 100 yards away. the lights were so bright it was hard to make out the exact details of the craft. it was approximately 50' in diameter, and it "floated" slilently about 100 ft. off the ground, through the tree(s) (gaining altitude slowly as it moved from (my) left to right as if it had just taken off from being on the ground). then past the tree(s) into a clearing where i saw it without any obstruction at all (though with the leaves falling off the trees this time of year i was able to see it pretty well even when it was "behind" them). it continued to gain altitude and speed until the roofs of the houses obstructed its view, but i observed it for at least 100-150 yards.

the evening after the 3rd sighting i was reading about the increase of ufo activity and came across this photo that a couple had taken of a ufo in ga just two nights prior (10-25-10) to my sighting which looks exactly like the craft that i last saw. i'm going to have to start taking my phone/camera with me when i go outside to smoke!
content.summary: Disk/cigar shape with four very bright white lights on the side facing me. no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
shortly before a partly cloudy sundown i happened to glance westerly at about a thirty-five degree angle above the horizon and observed a passenger aircraft traveling west by southwest. this aircraft was leaving a contrail.  it was then i saw a silvery object traveling parallel to and in a straight line and clearly under intelligent control. i observed it for about two or three minutes and noted that it was traveling almost twice as fast as the jetliner (i think), but was not leaving any kind of contrail or sound in its wake.
     i could not ascertain its size nor its height above the earth, but it was plainly visible and appeared very large in comparison. however, its outline was "fuzzy".  i could not determine the height of the aircraft either but could only see  a small 'dot' ahead of its contrail. i thought perhaps the object was an orbital satellite or the russian unmanned spacecreaft on its way to rendezvous with the space station, but it struck me as odd that it was traveling west, not east.  at the end of the estimated time period it disappeared behind a low cloud never to be seen again, though i continued observing the aircraft for a good five or six minutes longer.
    about an hour later i checked with a local television station and also  with the madison county mississippi sheriff's department but there had not been any more relevant calls.
content.summary: Bright object (sunlight reflection) traveling wsw parallel to pasenger aircraft

content.detailedDescription:
I ran out side to get a picture of whatever it was, but i thought i had missed it. to my surprise when i put my pictures on the computer it was there. at first glance you think you're looking at a stray cloud, but then it moves so quickly you know it's not.I had watched it go over the mountain with no sound, and this is not the only one i've seen. there are so many here i keep my camera close by in case there is another sighting.

a few days ago i watched one larger then this one going across from my father in laws place. i am a sky watcher, and i know what i saw was not anything we have in the looks or a plane. there were no wings, and no noise.

in the photograph there are more then one, and they seem to be studying the mountain, very strange! this is usually caught at night, as i have one from a night photo.
content.summary: White object passing just out side my window in a fast manner.

content.detailedDescription:
I was living in an apartment building at the top floor looking towards the sutter buttes.  i faced west and had a blind down to block the sun.  i went outside to raise the blind and saw in the almost totally darkened sky a disc which i would estimate as being the size to fit into a four block area.  it was about 300-1000 feet above me giving off only a slight humming sound.  what surprised me the most is that a vibration was given off to me with a great sense of peace and comfort and that i didn't need to look any further.  i then went inside and waited about 20-25 minutes and went back outside on my patio and the disc was still there.  it was harder to see the outline but the absence of stars in that area helped me determine the shape and size.  it hadn't seemed to move at all.  the sense of peace was still there.  i also had the feeling that i shouldn't talk about it.  i did tell my sister the next day but this is the first time i have become public with the sighting.  
a few years before that i sent in a photo taken near the sutter buttes showing a very large disc.  the response i got from mufon was that there were two more discs that were harder to determine.
i have believed most of my life in ufo's.  i had worked with the federal government for 10 years with the air force and know how they treat sensitive information.  i was the type that never asked questions about anything sensitive so i was determined to be safe for such discussions but it never happened.
this wasn't my first experience with ufo's/aliens but is the one that i am willing to discuss today.
content.summary: A disc with a cut out area suitable for a pilot station

content.detailedDescription:
Hi,

this event happened in mysore, karnataka, india. i was walking with 2 other friends of mine, when suddenly i looked up in the sky, because some few more people were looking in that direction in the sky. what we saw was very strange. some 12-15, star like, extremely small, just like stars, but were red in color, were moving in the sky as a group. they were moving quite slowly, not ver fast. 
their movement can be described in the following manner- : 2 in the front, then, some gap followed by 1, then gap followed by 3 more and so on. but they all were moving in 1 direction and there were around 15 of them. all were red in color. 
we tried making a video of it but could not. then after sighting them for a minute or so, since it was very cloudy here, they went behind the clouds one by one and then we did not see them again.
content.summary: Star shaped, red colored, 12-15 in number moving in a group.

content.detailedDescription: Comming home in aprial 1994 from arizona it was 2-3 am we were driving down i29 north 5 miles south of grand forks north dakota my friend was driving and we saw a light over a farm house it was 20 -30 below zero out side> were the only people on the road>i said zed look at that weird light and he said its an antenna and we started argueing about it than after watching it for 10 -15 minutes and me and zed a re now yelling at eachother im telling him it aint no antenna even tho we could see like a antenna gerting comming down >just than it did a turned in mid air and started comming torward us i yelled stop stop and as it got closer i yelled go go than stop stop we jumped out on the interstate and the craft went over us no more than 1000-3000 feet above us it was huge for sure it was a flying wing comming from the west at 4 in the morning this is very strange cuz we have no flying wing planes in gfafb we watched as it went over real low than we realized why he was their a huge huge craft was hovering to the east above our van it was trangle and had windows in the front like a hotel windows the next thing was real strange and we talk about it alot for years> we did the lost time thing you hear about we lost 2-3 hours and found ourselves standing on the highway at 30 below zero with no coates we didnt realize that we lost time till later  > the strangest thing to me was their was lights from trafic but the cars never came past us on the interstate this is the biggest thing that got me it;s like they were their but not comming  understand? now meny things have happened to us since this like albinos following us ya don;t laugh its real> ever see an albino in grand forks north dakota not hardly ive live here my whole liefe >yet my wife was being followed in the grocery store at the mall seems strange to me> i live on a farm now and i seem possessed to watch the sky every night i even have my bed next to the window so i can watch till i falll asleep< 2 years ago we were asleep and my back door has a chime i heard the chime and i woke up realizing we were being led back into the farm house in a line my kids and wife ahead of me but the chimes seem to knock me out of sleep or what i call a trance the family was walking back to bed when i came to than i saw them  they were 7feet tall lanky greys now like the little greys you see on tv these guys were tall<they realized i was awake and i chased them out of the farm house around the wifes jeep and they ran into the woods the next thing was i wokeup in bed and this was no dream it wasa real believe me or not i dont care this is the way it happened
content.summary: After meeting bob lazar in 1987 in vegas the world spun upside down

content.detailedDescription: I stepped out onto my deck to get some fresh air and look at the night sky as i often did back then. at the time i was living in owl's head me. which is in knox county. my house was on the dublin road on the airport side. i was looking up at the object facing towards lucha beach and the ocean. i first noticed the object as it came over the tree line. the red lights on each point immediately caught my attention. when i first noticed the motion of the object i immediately ruled out any human craft. unless it was a top secret government craft ( i highly doubted it) i had no other explination other than a ufo. i heard no noise coming from it as it flew. the fact that it flipped and rotated as it went, i couldn't think of any propulsion system that we have that would allow for that motion. i recall it was a moonless night and there was very little light pollution. a great evening for viewing stars. the object was moving from east to west roughly in that direction. i would say it was about 60 to 70 degrees from the horizon. the object had one red light on each point. there were either 5 red lights (if it was 3 sided) or 6 red lights (if it was four sided). the object was very black. i could distinguish between the object and the background as the craft was darker than the night sky. as it moved across the sky the object would rotate and then flip, and then rotate again. it did this in a regular pattern as it moved across the sky. it wasn't moving particularly fast. it moved straight across the sky, flipping and rotating as it went. i really could not estimate its size or altitude. i can only say that i got the impression that it wasn't particularly big. if i had to guess i would say between a bus and a house, but with no references and not knowing its altitude i really would only be guessing. the only facts i am sure of is the red lights at each point and its flight pattern. i could see its motion clearly thanks to the red lights. i could clearly make out its flip and rotation motion as it moved across the night sky. i lost sight of the craft as it moved over the tree line to the west. i was amazed by what i was seeing. i knew i was seeing something not of this world and i felt like i had won the lottery. my whole life i had wondered. i'm a science buff and i love thinking about those unanswered questions. it is one thing to hear others talk about their ufo experiences and another to have one yourself. before this event i always thought that it was possible that some of the ufo sightings were real. but, you are never certain until  you see it for yourself. i am 99.9 percent convinced that what i saw was an alien satellite sent to investigate our planet. given the way it moved across the sky i cannot conceive of any alien life being on board. i got the feeling that what i was seeing was an unmanned craft sent to earth to gather data. much like the satellites we send out to explore the planets in our own solar system.
content.summary: 3 sided or 4 sided flying diamond

content.detailedDescription:
My mother picked my then 5 year old daughter from school each day.  when i got home my daughter kept telling me the had seen a second sun. she told me how she had been riding in the back seat of the car in her booster seat and observed this great light she called a second sun.  the sun should have been on the west of the car. 

my daughter was telling my mom to look at the second sun.  my mom initially told her the sun was over on the other side of the car. but because my 5 year old was so persistent, my mom finally looked.  my mom and daughter both described a brilliant light as big and as bright as the sun that was changing colors and hovering.  their account was so dramatic regarding this light that was as big as the sun that i called the media and asked if there were any reports of this light.  there were none. 

i do not know the actual date.  i only know that it was early fall in the year or two prior to our moving to missouri. we moved here in 2004.
content.summary: Light as bright as the sun

content.detailedDescription:
About 1 am pst, my friend and i were camping along the southern beach area on maui. we were standing right at the shore line looking northwest up the coast when there appeared a bright red-ish/orange fireball/light coming from the interior of the island. i don't remember if we were already standing down at the shore when the light appeared or whether our noticing the light drew us to the spot. 

the light moved in a slight incline, maybe at 20 to 25 degrees. almost immediately after it appeared, there came another one right behind it. then two more followed (these two were very close together). another few seconds and another one, and then another. there may have been more but i honestly don't recall. 

i'm guessing that in total we saw between 6 and 8 of these lights over the course of only a few minutes. they didn't make a sound, although i'm estimating that they were probably a mile away from us. they moved in an almost straight line (slightly inclined as i stated above) out over the ocean (approx. one mile out) before disappearing behind/within the cloud cover. 

their light was consistent. it did not pulse or flash at all. these were definitely not airplanes, flares, or chinese lanterns. they looked and behaved like nothing i've seen before or since. 

i was not frightened at all. i'm not sure how my friend felt though, but i think it's reasonable to assume that he wasn't either. the odd thing was that we never mentioned it to our other two camping companions (they were fast asleep) and he and i never spoke about the incident, then or since. 

in fact, i paid the incident little mind until i listened to an open minds radio show hosted by alejandro rojas (aired october 25, 2010) in which his guest, keith chester, discussed his book about ufo sightings during ww2. keith mentioned how there was a definite difference between objects sighted over europe than those seen in the pacific region. it turns out the ones sighted in the pacific theater were mostly 'fireballs.' this prompted my reporting. 

i simply chalked the incident up as hawaiian folklore. i later read about the hawaiian 'fireballs' that seem very common out there and simply assumed that that's what i saw.
content.summary: Red-ish/orange fireball(s); approx 6-8 total, about pea sized at arms length

content.detailedDescription:
The ufo's were not noticed until i got home and looked at the pics.  i'm pretty observant and noticed the ufo's immediately.  their shape stood out to me as classic ufo shapes.  their orientation is a bit odd as they're not parallel to the ground as you might expect; they all appear to have different flight paths (strange).  anyway, it was a sunny day in the coastal mountains near grand ronde, oregon.  we were about 5 miles due south of the town.  there were 3 of us couples in 3 4x4 vehicles... we had been exploring all day.  we began taking pictures while on top of a high peak.  there was an interesting rock structure on top and we had been taking pics of our vehicles on parked top of it.  we placed a geocache there and made a small rock cairn in the rock structure and took a pic of it.  this picture shows the ufos.  i have many photos taken from this spot that day.  sadly, another one of the photos shows what i believe is 2 of the ufo's but i accidentally re-sized the photo when i got home that day  and the quality got cut down making it almost useless.  all other photos show nothing, just clear blue skies.  i'll also include a pic that i adjusted the contrast and shading which resulted in making the ufo's stand out more... i'm currently working on getting the photos from the other guys that were there that day to see if there's anything in them...
pic1: 3 ufo pic
pic2: 3 ufo pic + contrast + crop (zoom-in)
pic3: 2 ufo pic
content.summary: Three disc shaped objects unknowingly caught on film on a sunny day in the oregon coastal mountains
